text: Mathias Autret (born 1 March 1991) is a French professional footballer who plays as a winger for Ligue 2 club Auxerre. He is a France youth international and has played for the under-19 team in the past. ==Career== On 15 May 2010, Autret agreed to a professional contract with FC Lorient. He signed a loan deal with Ligue 2 team Caen on 1 July 2013. ==Style of play== Autret is a prototypical number 10 possessing great vision, dribbling, and passing skills.
